name: mobx-state-tree
description: Opinionated, transactional, MobX powered state container

scripts.build: tsc && cpr lib dist --delete-first --filter=\\.js && yarn rollup
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development yarn jest --ci && cross-env NODE_ENV=production yarn jest --ci && yarn run test:cyclic && yarn run test:mobx4
scripts.test:perf: yarn build && yarn jest:perf && TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs"}' /usr/bin/time node --expose-gc --require ts-node/register __tests__/perf/report.ts
scripts.test:mobx4: yarn add -D mobx@4.3.1 && yarn build && yarn jest --ci && git checkout package.json ../../yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts._prepublish: yarn run build && yarn run build-docs
scripts.build-docs: tsc && documentation build lib/index.js --sort-order alpha -f md -o ../../API.md.tmp && concat -o ../../API.md ../../docs/API_header.md ../../API.md.tmp && rm ../../API.md.tmp

author: Michel Weststrate
